CustomField.formula: CASE( LeadSource ,"Advertisement", IMAGE("/resource/1638866860000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/newspaper.png", "Advertisement"), "Word of mouth", IMAGE("/resource/1638866860000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/sound_none.png", "Word of mouth"),"Employee Referral", IMAGE("/resource/1638866860000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/user_suit.png", "Employee Referral"),"Public Relations", IMAGE("/resource/1638866860000/GraphicsPackNew/tangodesktopproject/16/theme/system-users.png", "Public Relations "),"WEB",IMAGE("/resource/1638866860000/GraphicsPackNew/tangodesktopproject/16/theme/applications-internet.png", "WEB"), IMAGE("/resource/1638866860000/GraphicsPackNew/fatcow/farmfresh/16/reseller_programm.png", "others"))
CustomField.label: Source
